name: The Supplant Company
headline: A brand-new blend of sugars â made from plant fiber!
description: The Supplant Company is defining a new category of food ingredient: sugars from fiber. Supplantâ¢ sugars from fiber is a brand-new blend of sugars found naturally in plant fiber. With Supplantâ¢ sugars from fiber, your favorite treats can look, feel and taste like theyâre supposed to. Because itâs made from fiber, Supplantâ¢ sugars from fiber is lower in calories, has a lower glycemic response (compared to glucose), and is prebiotic. Itâs made by upcycling agricultural side-streams. For example, in corn (maize), itâs made from the cob, not the kernel. In wheat and rice, itâs made from the straw, not the grain. These fiber-rich parts of crops are hugely abundant and donât typically make their way into the food system.

### We See Food Systems Differently
![Better Health. Better Climate. Food Security.](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2Fffee28f6df84328b6658bec9fc9ef604f4a590ab-3000x3000.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Better Health. Better Climate. Food Security.
**To build the food system that the world deserves, we need new ways of making better ingredients.**
**Our perspective begins by seeing the value in agriculture's most abundant and most wasted resource: side-streams like corn cobs, oat hulls and wheat straw. It's what we collectively call The Forgotten Half of the Harvest.**
**We develop science to turn these side streams into healthier and more sustainable replacements for some of food's most damaging ingredients, such as refined sugar and starch.**
**Because The Forgotten Half of the Harvest is the only agricultural product abundant enough, this is the only way we'll ever be able to replace these ingredients that can be damaging to our health and our planet.**
### It starts by seeing things differently. It ends with a better world for everyone.
![supplant company logo](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2Fd601a695a597d9dcb93e42537f11c54a321136c5-264x261.png&w=640&q=75)

### Made Without A Single Extra Crop
![\[object Object\] background image](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2F65c685cbb8645f575a96abfa4899eb4fab3753fd-760x1360.png&w=1920&q=75)![\[object Object\] background image](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2F1a13945ef7ed63362a2eae4f49ef94785d981677-2518x1380.png&w=3840&q=75)
“Supplant allows us to make chocolate bars that are just as delicious as the chocolate we make at The French Laundry.”Chef Thomas Keller
![\[object Object\] background image](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2Fb35ba5875ab88724b9942a034e4c81d02d69619c-760x1360.png&w=1920&q=75)![\[object Object\] background image](https://supplant.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fgj1tcdma%2Fnext%2F76e8024cc825dd7f25c34735992af83acc0ede9d-2518x1380.png&w=3840&q=75)
“If I were to have tasted these blind, I would have not been able to say that the chocolate or shortbread were made with a sugar replacement.”International Confectionery

generated_description:
### The Supplant Company: Revolutionizing Sugar from Fiber

Founded in 2017 and hailing from Cambridge, UK, The Supplant Company is on a mission to redefine how we think about sugar. Their innovative approach focuses on creating unique sugars derived entirely from plant fiber, thus carving out a new category in the food ingredient market. By upcycling agricultural by-products like corn cobs, wheat straw, and oat hulls—parts of crops that typically go to waste—they’re not only developing healthier sugar alternatives but also making strides toward sustainability.

### What’s Unique?

Supplant™ sugars are lower in calories, boast a reduced glycemic response compared to traditional glucose, and provide prebiotic benefits. The brilliance of their product lies in its ability to mimic the taste and texture of conventional sugars in our favorite treats without the associated health risks. This means you can have your chocolate cake and eat it too—guilt-free. As Chef Thomas Keller puts it, Supplant enables the creation of desserts just as delightful as those made with traditional sugar.

### The Vision

The Supplant Company's ethos revolves around a radical reevaluation of food systems. They see the missed potential in what they call “The Forgotten Half of the Harvest.” By focusing on what’s often discarded, they not only promote a healthier diet but also contribute to better climate outcomes and food security.

Their team consists of 15 passionate employees, and they have been nurtured by Y Combinator in Batch S18, positioning them uniquely in the food-tech and sustainable agriculture sectors. They are guided by a philosophy that emphasizes sustainability without sacrificing taste—an approach that resonates deeply with today’s health-conscious consumers.

### Why It Matters

In a world where the health implications of consuming high glycemic index sugars are becoming increasingly recognized, The Supplant Company is addressing an essential need. Their innovative products allow us to enjoy sweetness without the weighty consequences on our health or the planet. 

If you're interested in their work or looking to explore products made with their groundbreaking sugars, check out their website [The Supplant Company](https://supplant.com) for more details on their impact, products, and processes.

### Connecting with Supplant

Want to stay updated? Follow them on social media or visit their news section to see how they’re shaping the future of food!

In a nutshell, The Supplant Company isn't just making a sugar replacement—it's nurturing a vital shift toward a more sustainable and health-focused food industry. And that’s something worth sweetening up to!
